56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Enes İbn Malik şöyle dedi: "Biz Resulullah Sallallahu Aleyhi ve Sellem ile birlikte Tebuk savaşından döndük." Tekrar:

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ حَبَسَهُ الْعُذْرُ عَنِ الْغَزْوِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever is held back from Jihad by a legal cause
